channel.title: Urgent furnace
channel.description: alright I have an object list right? i added it to my client because It is the one that goes with my server. well I can't find a good furnace code like the one in falador that furnace I need the object code for that so please help I really need this for smithing.

item.title: Urgent furnace
item.dc:creator: @Alecrespawn Alecrespawn
item.description:
@Alecrespawn wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:416509”][quote author=Alecrespawn link=topic=518413.msg3767382#msg3767382 date=1317347156]
alright I have an object list right? i added it to my client because It is the one that goes with my server. well I can’t find a good furnace code like the one in falador that furnace I need the object code for that so please help I really need this for smithing.
[/quote]

You could modify the client to show the object id next to the name when you hover over it.

Or you can use the MoparScape client (standalone or web) as I believe it does this already.[/quote]

alright man I’ll try, thanks for the input

Read full topic

item.title: Urgent furnace
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Alecrespawn:

alright I have an object list right? i added it to my client because It is the one that goes with my server. well I can’t find a good furnace code like the one in falador that furnace I need the object code for that so please help I really need this for smithing.

You could modify the client to show the object id next to the name when you hover over it.

Or you can use the MoparScape client (standalone or web) as I believe it does this already.

Read full topic
